attributes.description:
2012 A3 Sportback 2.0 TDI Attraction S-Tronic for sale. Car comes with full service history. 

Car comes equipped with: SUNROOF, AIRCON , ABS , AIRBAGS, CLOTH SEATS , FRONT LOAD CD , AUX , HATCH BACK , S TRONIC transmission and ALLOY Wheels. 

This is a awesome sporty and economical car. Don't miss this rare auto diesel at this price. 

Trade-Ins are Welcome.
Finance can be arranged with all major banks with a additional administrative fee. Warranty options are available.

Audi A3 2.0 TDI (103kW)
Power - 103 kW @ 4200 rpm
Torque - 320 Nm @ 1750 rpm
Economy - 5.2 l/100km
Emissions - 138 g/km
Emissions Rating - EU5
Gears - 7 / FRONT
Acceleration - 9.9 seconds
Top Speed - 202 km/h
Airbags (total) - 6
Length - 4,385 cm
Seats - 5
Fuel Tank Capacity - 55 litres
Boot Capacity - 370 litres
Service Intervals - 15,000 km
